title: Fix warmhub-viewer example - registry passed as option instead of 3rd arg
description:
**Problem**: Plugin registry is passed as an option property (ignored) instead of the third argument to `generateHtml()`.

**Files**: examples/warmhub-viewer/view.ts, examples/warmhub-viewer/README.md

**Fix**: Change `generateHtml(entries, { theme: 'light', registry })` to `generateHtml(entries, { theme: 'light' }, registry)`

Reference: specs/shared/aef-review/plan.md Phase 7

title: Fix plugin initialize() never called
description:
**Problem**: Plugins with `initialize()` hooks never have them invoked, preventing setup logic.

**Files**: src/cli.ts

**Fix**: Add `await registry.initialize();` after plugin loading loop.

Reference: specs/shared/aef-review/plan.md Phase 5

title: Fix Claude Code Adapter Tool Correlation - tool.result pid points to message instead of tool.call
description:
## Problem
`tool.result` entries have `pid` pointing to the containing message instead of the corresponding `tool.call`, violating AEF spec §3.2.2.

## Files
- `src/adapters/claude-code.ts`
- `src/__tests__/claude-code-adapter.test.ts`

## Implementation
1. Add `Map<string, string>` to track `call_id` → AEF entry ID mappings
2. When emitting `tool.call`, store mapping: `toolCallEntryIds.set(toolCallId, entryId)`
3. When emitting `tool.result`, look up parent: `pid: toolCallEntryIds.get(callId) ?? messageId`
4. Track last `tool.result` ID, use as `pid` for subsequent assistant messages

## Tests to Add
- `tool.result.pid` points to corresponding `tool.call.id`
- Assistant message after tool.result has `pid` pointing to tool.result

## Reference
`specs/shared/aef-review/plan.md` Phase 1
close_reason: Added tests verifying tool.result.pid → tool.call.id and assistant message pid → tool.result linkage. Implementation was already correct.

title: Create OTel mapping documentation
description:
**Overview**: Create standalone document detailing AEF to OpenTelemetry mapping.

**Content**:
- Concept mapping table (sid→Trace ID, id→Span ID, etc.)
- Conversion rules for sessions, tool pairs, messages, errors
- Complete example with AEF input and OTLP output
- Future `aef export --format otlp` command documentation

**File**: docs/otel-mapping.md

Reference: docs/plan.md Future Work section

title: Implement aef adapters command
description:
**Overview**: Add `aef adapters` command to list available adapters with status.

**Output**:
- Adapter ID, name, description
- File patterns
- Implementation status (✓ Implemented / ○ Not implemented)
- --json option

**Files**: src/cli.ts, src/adapters/index.ts

Reference: docs/plan.md Phase 4

title: Implement viewer options - showTimestamps, showSequence, collapsedTools have no effect
description:
**Problem**: ViewerOptions declares options that have no practical effect - HTML renders the same regardless.

**Files**: src/viewer/types.ts, src/viewer/html.ts, src/viewer/renderers/*

**Implement**:
- showTimestamps: false → hide timestamps
- showSequence: true → show entry sequence numbers
- collapsedTools: true → collapse tool results by default
- maxContentLength → truncate with 'show more'

Reference: specs/shared/aef-review/plan.md Phase 9

title: Complete ALF to AEF documentation rename
description:
**Problem**: 200+ references to 'ALF' remaining across codebase after rename to 'AEF'.

**Scope**: docs/plan.md, docs/aef-viz.md, examples/warmhub-viewer/, test files

**Changes**:
- `bun alf` → `bun aef`
- 'ALF' → 'AEF'
- 'Agent Log Format' → 'Agent Event Format'

Reference: specs/shared/aef-review/plan.md Phase 8

title: Implement Gemini CLI adapter
description:
**Overview**: Transform Gemini CLI logs into AEF format. Brings Google ecosystem users into AEF.

**Prerequisites**:
- Locate Gemini CLI log format documentation
- Analyze sample log files
- Document format in docs/formats/gemini.md

**Deliverables**:
- docs/formats/gemini.md
- src/adapters/gemini.ts
- src/__tests__/adapters/gemini.test.ts
- src/__tests__/fixtures/gemini/

Reference: docs/plan.md Phase 5

title: Implement Codex CLI adapter
description:
**Overview**: Transform Codex CLI logs into AEF format. Validates cross-vendor story and brings OpenAI ecosystem users into AEF.

**Prerequisites**:
- Locate Codex CLI log format documentation
- Analyze sample log files
- Document format in docs/formats/codex.md

**Deliverables**:
- docs/formats/codex.md
- src/adapters/codex.ts
- src/__tests__/adapters/codex.test.ts
- src/__tests__/fixtures/codex/

Reference: docs/plan.md Phase 3

title: Fix extension type schema regex - only allows 3 lowercase segments
description:
**Problem**: JSON Schema regex only allows exactly 3 lowercase segments, but docs say 'minimum 3 segments' and real-world needs hyphens.

**Current regex**: `^[a-z][a-z0-9]*\.[a-z][a-z0-9]*\.[a-z][a-z0-9]*$`

**Files**: src/schema/core.schema.json, docs/extensions.md, src/__tests__/validator.test.ts

**Fix**: Update to `^[a-z][a-z0-9-]*\.[a-z][a-z0-9-]*(\.[a-z][a-z0-9-]*)+$`

Reference: specs/shared/aef-review/plan.md Phase 2

title: Update README adapter status table
description:
**Problem**: Adapter status table shows reactpoc and claude-code as 'Planned' but they're already implemented.

**File**: README.md

**Change**:
- reactpoc: Planned → ✅ Implemented
- claude-code: Planned → ✅ Implemented
- Add usage examples for convert command

title: Witness for aef - monitors polecat health and progress.
description: Witness for aef - monitors polecat health and progress.

title: Fix semantic validator gaps - wrong spec refs, missing cross-session validation
description:
**Problems**:
1. Spec references in error messages don't match current spec sections
2. pid/deps aren't constrained to same sid - cross-session dependencies pass silently

**Files**: src/semantic-validator.ts, src/__tests__/semantic-validator.test.ts

**Fix**: Update specRefs, add cross-session pid/deps validation.

Reference: specs/shared/aef-review/plan.md Phase 6

title: Fix ReactPOC message count - hardcoded to 2
description:
**Problem**: `session.end.summary.messages` is hardcoded to 2, even when no assistant answer is emitted.

**Files**: src/adapters/reactpoc.ts

**Fix**: Add messageCount variable, increment on user/assistant messages, use in session.end.

Reference: specs/shared/aef-review/plan.md Phase 4

title: Implement aef info command
description:
**Overview**: Add `aef info` command to display log file metadata.

**Output**:
- File name and size
- Session count
- Entry counts by type
- Time range and duration
- Agents and models used
- --json option for machine-readable output

**Files**: src/cli.ts, src/__tests__/cli-info.test.ts

Reference: docs/plan.md Phase 4

title: Fix ESM interop fragility - Ajv.default pattern is Bun-specific
description:
**Problem**: Current `Ajv.default`/`addFormats.default` ESM interop pattern is Bun-specific and may crash in Node.js.

**Files**: src/validator.ts

**Fix**: Use `(Ajv as any).default || Ajv` pattern for runtime-agnostic interop.

Reference: specs/shared/aef-review/plan.md Phase 3
